items.sentence: Tom rummaged through the drawer, looking for a pencil.
Tom has trouble keeping up with the rest of the class.
Tom is left-handed, but he writes with his right hand.
Tom is quite knowledgeable about modern popular music.
Tom is the only witness. There are no other witnesses.
Tom told Mary she couldn\'t quit on such short notice.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t like her sense of humor.
Tom told Mary that she shouldn\'t go there by herself.
The factory decided to do away with the old machinery.
The food is very good in the dormitory where he lives.
